item.title: Filing MicroEntity Accounts
item.description: Filing microentity accounts This is meant to document how to use HMRC’s service to input accounts and company house data when using Beancount and HMRC. Get Beancount up to date Generate annual accounts by editing report Input data here by hand Opening questions These are the questions and the answers to which this process applies. What is your organisation? Company Do you want to make changes to a Company Tax Return you’ve already filed?
